review.comment: I met Shawn several years ago at a business seminar. We hit it off right away and he has helped me with numerous projects over the years. These included helping me write a business proposal, organizing a new revenue stream and finding better, more effective ways to communicate with my clients! Shawn is patient, quite knowledgeable, and definitely goes over and above for his clients!
review.review_reply: Thank you Lori, I have thoroughly enjoyed working with you.

review.comment: It really doesn't matter your experience level or where you may be in your business ventures,  Shawn with M2X Solutions can help. I am a beginner and needed to understand some basics. Shawn took the time to work with me. In fact we stayed up until 1:00 am discussing funnels. Shawn is the real deal!
review.review_reply: Thank you David, that was a fun night talking funnels.
